content: Awaken refreshed and renewed in any of our completely reimagined Estate Rooms. Adorned in light woods, timeless furnishings, and locally-inspired photography, the bedrooms feature luxurious Duxiana matresses as well as bespoke red flower bathroom amenities. State-of-the-art technologies include smart TVs and Lutron lighting that enables guests to customize privacy settings with the touch of a button. A custom chocolate turn-down service highlights award-winning confections by Frederic Loraschi.
